entry.title: Eternity
entry.content:
;Eternity

;
;

;A client for Lemmy, specifically designed for Android and written in Java. This project is a fork of the Infinity for
; Reddit project, and it is currently in the early stages of development. As such, expect many unfinished features and
; potential bugs!

;
;
;

;Features

;
;

;Eternity is currently in the early stages of development. Expect many
; unfinished features and bugs!

;
;

;Browsing Lemmy

;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Explore various feeds (Subscribed/Local/All) and communities
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Subscribe or unsubscribe from specific communities, with the option
    ; to block
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Discover communities federated with the current instance
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Favorite a community for quick access
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Manage your subscriptions and blocked communities
    • ;
    ;
;
;

;Content Engagement

;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Engage with content by voting, saving, sharing, and creating posts
    ; or comments
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Enjoy endless scrolling through feeds and posts
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Tailor the view settings for posts (card,compact, gallery)
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Set default preferences for post and comment sorting
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Stay updated with notifications for replies
    • ;
    ;
;
;

;Account Management

;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Sign in to multiple accounts or instances, and effortlessly switch
    ; between them
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Use the inbox features to view replies, mentions, and private
    ; messages
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Access your profile to view your posts, comments, and saved
    ; content
    • ;
    ;
;
;

;Customization

;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Choose between various theme options including Light, Dark,
    ; OLED
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Support Material You theming
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Explore user-created themes
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Customize font settings
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Optional bottom navigation bar
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Discover a plethora of other customization features
    • ;
    ;
;
entry.summary: An Lemmy client for Android, forked from the Infinity for Reddit project.

entry.title: Gallery
entry.content:
;;Gallery ;for Android is a light-weight Media Gallery app for Android made with Jetpack Compose. It supports albums, favorites and more. It also features an integrated video player.

;
;
;

; 

;
;
;

;;Features;

;
;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Media Timeline screen where you can see all the photos videos
    ;
      ;
      ;
    • ;The Timeline screen is visible from the Main screen and inside each album
      • ;
      ;
    • ;Media is separated in groups by date
      • ;
      ;
    ;
    ;
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Multi-Select photos and videos to perform batch operations like
    ;
      ;
      ;
    • ;Mark as favorite
      • ;
      ;
    • ;Move to trash
      • ;
      ;
    • ;Share
      • ;
      ;
    ;
    ;
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Sort and Pin Albums
    ;
      ;
      ;
    • ;Sort  by Date, Label
      • ;
      ;
    • ;Pin on top most loved albums
      • ;
      ;
    ;
    ;
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Quickly Access all the Favorites 
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Manage the Trashed Items from a single screen
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Custom Video Player powered by ;Media3 ExoPlayer;
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Modern ;Material 3; Design Guidelines powered by ;Jetpack Compose;
    • ;
    ;
  • ;;;Open Source;;
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Active Development
    • ;
    ;
;
;
entry.summary: Light-weight Media Gallery

entry.title: Ricochlime
entry.content:
Ricochlime is a game where you attack the advancing slimes with your ricocheting projectiles. The game is made with the Flame game engine and Flutter.
;
entry.summary: Satisfying slime shooter

entry.title: MobileInpact
entry.content: MobileInpact is an unofficial client for NextInpact. It downloads articles from RSS feed, organize them and allows to consult them afterwards, even offline.
entry.summary: MobileInpact is an unofficial client for NextInpact.

entry.title: Friend Alert
entry.content:
;FriendAlert: Keep Your Friendships Thriving, No Matter How Far Apart

;
;

;Life's adventures lead us to friendships that cross cities, countries, and even continents. While
;these connections add immeasurable value to our lives, keeping them vibrant across distances can be
;a challenge. Born from this universal struggle, FriendAlert is your go-to solution for keeping those
;important friendships alive and well.

;
;

;üåç ;Your Central Hub for Global Friendships;
;Whether your friendships were formed on the playground or during an international journey,
;FriendAlert functions as your unified platform for sustaining these invaluable bonds. With
;FriendAlert, neither miles nor time zones can weaken your connections.

;
;

;üó£Ô∏è ;Foster Authentic Connections: More than Just Check-ins;
;Social media may offer cursory updates about people's lives, but it's no substitute for genuine
;conversation. FriendAlert encourages you to engage in meaningful dialogues that go beyond the
;superficial.

;
;

;A Personal Perspective

;
;

;I created FriendAlert with the aim of maintaining contact with the people who matter most to me.
;While the app's utility can vary, here are some personal guidelines I follow:

;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Use FriendAlert to track those you find you're losing touch with, not the friends you see
    ;regularly.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Although in-person meetings are irreplaceable, phone or video calls serve as excellent
    ;alternatives when that's not feasible.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Texting, though convenient, falls short in conveying emotional nuance and should not be your
    ;primary mode of communication.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Engaging via social media‚Äîsuch as liking photos or commenting‚Äîsimply doesn‚Äôt cut it when it comes
    ;to nurturing real friendships.
    • ;
    ;
;
;

;Elevate Your Social Ecosystem

;
;

;FriendAlert emerged from a personal need for an accessible, budget-friendly way to sustain my social
;circle. While platforms like nouri.ai have their merits, FriendAlert offers a free and user-friendly
;alternative.

;
;

;Sharing good moments is nice. Let's enrich not just our conversations, but our lives and communities
;through stronger, more meaningful connections.

;
entry.summary: Nurture distant friendships with timely reminders

entry.title: TimePlanner
entry.content:
Time planner is an application for convenient planning and tracking of your schedule.
;The application contains templates that allow you to quickly make a schedule, you can also enable auto-repeat of the template and no longer worry about manually adding it.
;Each task in the schedule has its own category and subcategory for structuring your actions.
;According to the mimio of this, there is analytics in the application that will help you make your plans for the day more effectively
;
;Available languages üåç
;- Russian üá∑üá∫
;- English üá¨üáß
;- German üá©üá™
;- Spanish üá™üá∏
;- French üá´üá∑
;- Persian üáÆüá∑ (beta)
;
;Support üì±
;- Local time and task analytics üìä
;- Templates for everyday tasks üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
;- Recurring tasks by templates üîÅ
;- Data Backup & Recovery üíæ
;- Scheduled Notifications ‚è∞
;- Priorities and protection from overlaying tasks üìê
;- Theme: Dark | Light üñ§ü§ç
;- Dynamic Color or 4 different color variations üé®
entry.summary: Convenient and fast task planning for the day

entry.content:

entry.title: Audile
entry.content:
;Audile; is a music recognition application, that can help you quickly and accurately recognize a music track playing nearby you.
;This application uses the AudD¬Æ service as a Music Recognition API.
;
;;Features:;
;
;;Recognition; - Audile allows you to perform song recognition in one click. The app will save the recording if there is no internet, and the recognition process will be executed when you come back online. You can customize the default behavior for unsuccessful recognition (no internet, no matches, another failure) via the preferences.
;;Notification service; - You can use the app from the notification drawer. Manage the recognition process and receive information about the track.
;;About track; - In case of successful recognition, information about the track, such as the name, artist, album and year, artwork, links to this track on popular music services, lyrics is provided.
;;Library; - All recognized tracks are stored in the application's library. You can filter the track list, create a favorites collection, search for tracks, or delete tracks.
;;Preferences; - The app has a number of options for customizing its behavior and appearance, which can be found on the settings screen.
;
entry.summary: Music recognition app

;
entry.summary: SilverDict ËØçÂÖ∏ÊúçÂä°Âô® Android ÂÆ¢Êà∑Á´Ø

entry.title: LibreRandonaut
entry.content:
LibreRandonaut is an open-source Android app for generating true random coordinates that allow users to explore their surroundings and perform the activity "randonauting".
;
;It interfaces with the QRNG at the Australian National University, where it obtains a list of quantum random numbers, converts them to coordinates, and then computes the Gaussian kernel density estimate of those coordinates to find a point with a statistically anomalous density.
;
entry.summary: Randonauting - explore your surroundings with quantum randomness

entry.title: Oinkoin
entry.content:
Oinkoin Money Manager makes managing personal finances easy and secure. It is light and easy to use. You need just few taps to keep track of your expenses. Simplicity and Security are our two main drivers: Oinkoin is an offline and ad-free app.
;
;* Privacy caring
;We believe you should be the only person in control of your data. Oinkoin cares about your privacy, therefore it works completely offline and without any ads! No special permissions are required.
;
;* Save your battery
;The app only consumes battery when you use it, no power consuming operations are performed in background.
;
;* Statistics
;Understandable and clean statistics and charts!
entry.summary: Oinkoin Money Manager makes managing personal finances easy and secure.

entry.title: Sayboard
entry.content:
;This project provides a voice keyboard using ;Vosk;. It is based on ;https://github.com/Felicis/vosk-android-demo;.

;
;

;This app requires a Vosk model to run. You can use the built-in downloader or download manually from ;https://alphacephei.com/vosk/models;, and then import into the app.

;
;
;
;

;Sayboard uses for the following permissions:

;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;INTERNET - to download the models. This permission is not required, and can be revoked through the device settings in compatible ROMs. ;Sayboard does not, and never will, send any of your information over the internet!;.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;RECORD_AUDIO - well, this is a voice keyboard after all.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;POST_NOTIFICATIONS - to show download and import progress.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;FOREGROUND_SERVICE - to download and import models in the background.
    • ;
    ;
;
;
;
;

;Due to file size limits, only 64bit ARM architecture is included here. APKs for other devices can be downloaded from the project's ;Github page;.
entry.summary: An open-source on-device voice IME (keyboard) for Android using the Vosk library

entry.title: Candle
entry.content:
A very simple app that allows you to use your display as a torch. The brightness can be adjusted and the app can be started from a quick settings tile.
;
entry.summary: A display torch

entry.title: NanoLedger
entry.content:
NanoLedger is a data entry app for plain text accounting. It supports the ledger and hledger syntax.
;
;You can view all transactions in a file, and easily add a new one. While adding, auto-completion is supported for payee, note and account names.
;
entry.summary: Data entry app for plain text accounting

entry.title: Prav
entry.content:
Whether you want to text your friends and family, or to make calls, prav app makes it easy for you. It provides convenient onboarding and user-friendly interface.
;
;We believe privacy is a fundamental right and should be easily exercised by anyone.
;
;With prav, your chats are private and only you can read them https://prav.app/privacy-policy/. It is based on XMPP protocol, so users can talk to any other XMPP users all over the world, without being locked-in to a service.
;
;Prav's source code is available publicly under a free license, providing transparency and audatibility. We are backed by a cooperative society in India, leading to democratic decision making.
;
;Learn more at https://prav.app.
;
entry.summary: A user-friendly messenger for everyone with a focus on privacy and freedom!

entry.title: huggingAssist
entry.content: huggingAssist ist ein WebView-Wrapper f√ºr HuggingChat. Die App blockiert alle URLs, die f√ºr die Funktion nicht essentiell sind.
entry.summary: WebView wrapper for HuggingChat

entry.title: Ansible Sempahore Client
entry.content:
Run Ansible Playbook from your phone by using ansible semaphore server.
;
;Install ansible semaphore server by this link, https://github.com/ansible-semaphore/semaphore.
;
entry.summary: Client App for Ansible Sempahore

entry.title: JS-Dict
entry.content:
JS-Dict is a convenient app for accessing the powerful Japanese-English dictionary Jisho.org.
;
;This app is Free and Open-Source Software. The source code is available at https://github.com/petlyh/JS-Dict.
entry.summary: Japanese-English dictionary app powered by Jisho.org.

entry.title: Quran 16 Line - Quran Revision Helper
entry.content:
Quran 16 Line is an app for people that are memorizing or have already memorized the holy quran. The pages are in 16 Line format which is the most popular format in the Indopak region.
;
;You can use this app to:
;- Read quran
;- Mark ayahs that you want to revise more often or that have mistakes
;- Take quiz
;- See list of mutashabihas for each para/juz
;
entry.summary: Quran in 16 line page format with mutashabihas and mistake marking

entry.title: TIDY Text-to-Image Discovery
entry.content:
Offline Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image search on Android.
;Search for images in your Gallery by text description and other visually similar images. TIDY works entirely offline, ensuring your privacy and security.
;
;Features:
;
;* Text-to-Image Search - Simply type in a description of the image you are looking for, and TIDY will retrieve the most relevant matches from your local image library. Text-to-Image search functionality in TIDY goes beyond traditional keyword-based searches! You can use longer and more detailed descriptions to find the exact image you have in mind.
;* Image-to-Image Search - Search for visually similar images by choosing a photo from your device's gallery. TIDY will analyze the image and retrieve images with similar visual features, allowing you to explore and discover new images in a whole new way.
;
;First launch:
;During the first launch TIDY will need to scan through your photo library and create an index of your images. This indexing process may take some time, but it's a one-time event. Once this initial indexing process is complete, the app will store the index on your device, and any new photos you add to your photo library will be automatically added to the index on the subsequent app launches.
;
entry.summary: Offline semantic Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image search on Android

entry.title: 8-Bit Wonders
entry.content:
Mit 8-Bit-Wonders kannst du mit den Computern deiner Jugend (oder der deiner Eltern oder der deiner Gro√üeltern) arbeiten und spielen und dabei alle Vorteile der modernen Technik behalten:
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Externe Tastaturen, Gamepads und Joystick k√∂nnen √ºber USB oder Bluetooth verwendet werden.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Es gibt eine vollst√§ndige virtuelle Tastatur, einen Joystick und ein Lenkrad f√ºr den Touchscreen.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Alle Disketten- und Kassettenformate von VICE werden unterst√ºtzt.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Dateien k√∂nnen im Ger√§tespeichern und in der Cloud abgelegt sein.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Spielst√§nde k√∂nnen gespeichert, auf dem Startbildschirm der App abgelegt und geteilt werden.
    • ;
    ;
;
;
;Zur Zeit werden der C64, der beliebteste Computer der 80er und sein Vorg√§nger, der VC20, unterst√ºtzt.
entry.summary: 8-Bit Wonders is a C64 and VIC20 emulator for your Android device.

entry.title: SpMp
entry.content:
;Features:;
;
;- Edit song, artist, and playlist titles
;- Set separate languages for app UI and metadata like song titles
;- In-app YouTube Music login
;- Display time-synchronised lyrics from [KuGou](https://www.kugou.com/)
; - Timed lyrics are displayed in a toggleable bar above every app page
; - Furigana (readings) display above Japanese kanji within lyrics
;- Select multiple songs for batch actions on any screen
;- Pin any song, playlist, album, or artist to the top of the main page
;- Customisable Discord rich presence
;- Easily insert songs at any position in the queue
;
entry.summary: A YouTube Music client with a focus on language and metadata customisation

entry.title: OpenAthena‚Ñ¢ for Android
entry.content:
Android Áâà OpenAthena‚Ñ¢ ÊòØÂÖçË¥πÁöÑÂºÄÊ∫êËΩØ‰ª∂ÔºåÂèØËÆ©ÊôÆÈÄöÊó†‰∫∫Êú∫ÂÆö‰ΩçÁ≤æÁ°Æ‰ΩçÁΩÆ
;
;üñºÔ∏èüë®‚Äçüíª + üßÆ‚õ∞Ô∏è = üéØüìç
;
;ËØ∑ËÆøÈóÆ ;https://OpenAthena.com; ‰∫ÜËß£Êõ¥Â§ö‰ø°ÊÅØ
;
entry.summary: OpenAthena‚Ñ¢ ËÆ©ÊôÆÈÄöÊó†‰∫∫Êú∫ËÉΩÂ§üÂÆö‰ΩçÁ≤æÁ°Æ‰ΩçÁΩÆ

entry.title: Voyager for Lemmy
entry.content:
Voyager is a free and open source client for Lemmy. Voyager respects your privacy: no trackers and no advertisements.
;
;App development is driven by the community. Get involved on Github!
;
;What does Voyager offer?
;
;- No trackers or advertisements, ever
;- Multi-account support
;- Gesture-driven UI
;- Compact and large post feed mode
;- Mark posts as read on scroll
;- Hide read posts, or hide individually
;- A beautiful private messages UI
;- Settings to customize Voyager to your desire
;- Quick community switcher
;- Open source: code is available on Github
entry.summary: Join the discussion

entry.title: Canta
entry.content:
Canta allows you to uninstall *any* app
;from your device, even if you don't have root access.
;
;You'll need to install [Shizuku](https://shizuku.rikka.app/download/)
;and [activate it](https://shizuku.rikka.app/guide/setup/) before using Canta.
;
;Uses [universal debloat list](https://github.com/0x192/universal-android-debloater/) for badges.
;Please read the guide
;on [how recommendations are chosen](https://github.com/0x192/universal-android-debloater/wiki/FAQ#how-are-the-recommendations-chosen)
;
;Features
;* no device bricking - though if you remove an important app,
;you will still need to perform a factory reset
;* no root required
;
entry.summary: Uninstall any app without root!

entry.title: Cosmic IDE
entry.content: No description.
entry.summary: A full fledged Java and Kotlin IDE for Android devices.

entry.title: Fast Draw
entry.content:
A simple Android launcher that prioritizes access to apps at the cost of space for widgets (still supports adding a single widget).
;You can add shortcuts.
;Your apps and shortcuts can be arranged into categories.
;That's about it.
;
entry.summary: A simple Android launcher with categories

entry.title: Elfeed Mobile
entry.content:
Read your feed entries from the device and have them synchronized with your
;Emacs. The app connects remotely to Elfeed web API and it gets the feeds content
;through it.
;
;This app requires that you have elfeed running in your computer and elfeed api
;accessible remotely. Check the project page for more info: http://github.com/areina/elfeed-cljsrn
;
;
;The app is open source and the source code is available in the project page.
;
entry.summary: Mobile client for Elfeed, an extensible web feed reader for Emacs

entry.title: Dungeon Crawl: Stone Soup for Android
entry.content:
An unofficial port of the classic roguelike Dungeon Crawl: Stone Soup for Android. This is the ASCII version.
;Can you retrieve the Orb of Zot? Probably not!
;
;------------------------------------------------
;
;Looking for the tiles version? The official tiles version (not made by me) can be downloaded from here: http://crawl.develz.org/download.htm
;
entry.summary: An ASCII port of Dungeon Crawl: Stone Soup.

entry.title: Tip Calculator
entry.content:
Dead simple tip calculator that computes tip based on the subtotal, pre-tax. It's also my first app, so some things are missing that I don't know how to implement just yet.
;
entry.summary: Simple tip calculator that operates on pre-tax amount

entry.title: Osram Remote
entry.content:
An android app for controlling Osram RGB lights using infrared.
;Your phone needs to have an IR emitter use this app.
;Currently only supports built-in IR emitters.
;
entry.summary: An app to turn your phone into a remote for lights

entry.title: Inner Breeze
entry.content: Discover the simplicity of breath with Inner Breeze, a dedicated app to guide and track your Wim Hof Breathing Method journey. Tailored to both novices and experienced practitioners, Inner Breeze offers intuitive features to enhance your breathing exercises. From personalized tempo settings to insightful tracking, elevate your mindfulness and unlock the transformative power of breath. Inner Breeze is more than just an app; it's your daily oasis of calm and invigoration.
entry.summary: Elevate your Wim Hof breathing practice.

entry.title: DataBackup
entry.content:
;DataBackup; is based on ;speed-backup;. It was born with the consent of the author.
;
;;DataBackup; is intended to back up and restore the data of your apps. It works on arm64-v8a, armeabi-v7a, x86 and x86_64 devices with Android 9 or higher.
;
;
;;Features include:;
;
;* ;Multi-user Support;
;* ;100% Data Integrity;
;* ;Fast;
;* ;Easy;
;* ;...;
;
entry.summary: Back up/Restore your data.

entry.title: Ladefuchs
entry.content:
WAS KOSTET DER STROM F√úR DEIN E-AUTO?
;Blitzschnell die g√ºnstigste Ladekarte finden.
;
;Mit einem Fingerwischen zeigt Dir der Ladefuchs die g√ºnstigste Ladekarte an der EV-Lades√§ule.
;
;Nicht mehr, nicht weniger.
;
;Dank chargeprice.app sind die Daten immer aktuell.
;
;Die App ist kostenlos. Der kleine Ladefuchs freut sich allerdings wie ein junger Dachs √ºber Futterspenden.
;
;Er fiepst dann immer ein bisschen.
;
;Wer ist eigentlich schuld?
;--------------------------
;* Malik & Flowinho von audiodump.de
;* Bastian ‚ÄôSchlingel‚Äò W√∂lfle von bitsundso.de
;* Dominic Wrege
;* Thorsten Roesler
;* Illu: Aga und Marcel-Andr√©
;
;Ideen? Bugs?
;--------------
;Bitte an android@ladefuchs.app
;
;Falls du Vorschl√§ge f√ºr Fu√ünotentexte hast, lass es uns wissen auf https://ladefuchs.app/fussnote
;
;Anti-Features/Unerw√ºnschte Merkmale
;-----------------------------------
;
;* Non-Free Network Services / Propriet√§re Netzwerkdienste - Die App greift auf einen eigenen API-Server zu, der wiederum Daten von chargeprice.app bezieht.
;
;Permissions / Berechtigungen
;----------------------------
;
;* INTERNET - Zugriff auf den eigenen API-Server
;* ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - √úberpr√ºfen, ob eine Internetverbindung besteht, bevor versucht wird auf, den API-Server zuzugreifen
;
entry.summary: Shows the cheapest charging card - with only one swipe at the charging point.

entry.title: Forkyz Scanner
entry.content:
Crossword-scanning companion app to Forkyz crossword app.
;
;Supports scanning puzzles from the camera, image files, or PDF.
;
;Scanning is a multi-step process: scan the grid, then the columns of clues. The scan results can be edited to make corrections. The puzzle can then be shared with other apps (e.g. Forkyz) for playing.
;
;The app is somewhat heavyweight: it includes OpenCV for image processing and Tesseract for text recognition. Language packs for text recognition must be downloaded from settings before this feature can be used.
;
;
entry.summary: Crossword-scanning companion app to Forkyz crossword app.

entry.title: WallFlow Plus
entry.content:
Beautiful wallpapers from wallhaven.cc (more sources to be added in the future). Designed with Material Design 3 and supports wide screen devices like tablets.
;
;Features
;
;* Smart wallpaper cropping using on-device object detection powered by Tensorflow Lite.
; * Supports adding your own TFLite models. You can find more models on Tensorflow Hub.
;* Multi-pane layout for tablets and other wide screen devices
;* Auto wallpaper changer
;* Save searches
;* Mark wallpapers as favorite
;* Local Wallpapers
;* Use saved searches, favorites, and local wallpapers in auto wallpaper
;* Search history
;* Supports all filters provided by wallhaven.cc
;* Search results caching to reduce api calls
;* Options to tweak the wallpaper grid layout
;* Dynamic theme (Material You)
;* Supports multi-display environments (eg. when connected to external monitors)
;
entry.summary: Beautiful wallpapers from wallhaven.cc with object detection feature
